sentences.sentence: On the tensions around Taiwan, Blinken said they are not aiming for confrontation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Any differences between mainland China and Taiwan need to be resolved peacefully.

sentences.sentence: There is concern that were there to be a crisis as a result of China's actions over over Taiwan that would have repercussions for quite literally every country on earth. 50% of commercial traffic, 50% of global commercial traffic goes through the Taiwan Strait every day. 70% of the semiconductors that we need for our smartphones, for our dishwashers, for our cars, they're made on Taiwan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
